mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT JOIN (SELECT * FROM CIP_ATTACHFILE GROUP BY SOURCE_UNIQUE_SEQ) AS CIP ON PRODUCT_ID = SOURCE_UNIQUE_SEQ WHERE CLOTHES_NAME LIKE #{SEARCH_TEXT};
